Description:

Since 1992, our people have been the secret to our success. Menemsha has delivered thousands of successful projects to both private and public sector clients throughout North America and internationally, including P.F. Chang’s, Wingstop, Starbucks, Lululemon, Office Depot, CVS, Citibank, Regions Bank, Citizens Bank, and Tractor Supply Co. Our reputation is built on the outstanding innovation and technical excellence that our people deliver.
Together we nurture an inclusive and collaborative culture that embraces new ideas and exciting new technologies. We empower each other to succeed. We celebrate our successes. We stand on great thinking, not on formality. We support our staff in all they do, recognizing that each of us has passions outside of work as well. Menemsha is a great place to invest in your talent, to learn from others, and to grow. Something special is happening at Menemsha and we invite you to see for yourself. We look forward to saying hello.
Job Details: HYBRID
Seeking a Business Development professional who knows the general construction market in the New England/ Northeast area. The VP of Business Development reports to the Executive VP of Business Development and Marketing. Earning potential $300K
• Lead company business development, marketing, and proposal activities.
• Secure commercial construction projects (Ground Up and/or Large Scale Renovation/Fit out)
• Leverage contacts and previous clients to open new opportunities for business.
• Build and maintain relationships with key decision-makers, architects, developers, and other industry professionals.
• Identify, develop and recommend strategy & tactics to expand new business opportunities.
• Stay current with market trends and current business environment.
• Remain up to date with industry trends and potential opportunities.
• Collaborate with the pre-construction and estimating teams to prepare comprehensive RFP’s (including writing key proposal sections).
• Update and maintain lead tracking databases with relevant information on targeted clients, contacts, and opportunities.

Requirements:
• BA/BS degree (Construction, Business, Marketing or related field) is a plus.
• Generate new business through industry contacts and current/previous clients.
• Approximately 5+ years’ experience in the construction industry with a successful track record.
• Established relationships within the industry that would allow you to generate new business.
• Excellent Presentation, relationship building and communications skills; verbal & written are required.
• Ability to interact & communicate with clients, staff, subcontractors, and executive management.
• Ability and previous successful experience developing new business and creating technical proposals.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $130,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year

Work Location: Remote
